update sys_file set id=#{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date_time=#{record.createDateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted=#{record.deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date_time=#{record.updateDateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version=#{record.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id=#{record.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name=#{record.fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_path=#{record.filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_size=#{record.fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_id=#{record.formId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, saved_name=#{record.savedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_md=#{record.fileMd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_suffix=#{record.fileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time=#{record.startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time=#{record.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_publish=#{record.filePublish,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_pwd=#{record.filePwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak1=#{record.bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak2=#{record.bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak3=#{record.bak3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak4=#{record.bak4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_kind=#{record.fileKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, es_id=#{record.esId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del=#{record.isDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exp_date=#{record.expDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dataId=#{record.dataid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag=#{record.flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak5=#{record.bak5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak6=#{record.bak6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak7=#{record.bak7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak8=#{record.bak8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_img_path=#{record.partImgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak9=#{record.bak9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak10=#{record.bak10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_file set create_date_time=#{createDateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted=#{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date_time=#{updateDateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version=#{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id=#{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name=#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_path=#{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_size=#{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_id=#{formId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, saved_name=#{savedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_md=#{fileMd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_suffix=#{fileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time=#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time=#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_publish=#{filePublish,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_pwd=#{filePwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak1=#{bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak2=#{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak3=#{bak3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak4=#{bak4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_kind=#{fileKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, es_id=#{esId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del=#{isDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exp_date=#{expDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dataId=#{dataid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag=#{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak5=#{bak5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak6=#{bak6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak7=#{bak7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak8=#{bak8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_img_path=#{partImgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak9=#{bak9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak10=#{bak10,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select id, create_date_time, deleted, update_date_time, version, create_user_id, file_name, file_path, file_size, form_id, saved_name, file_md, file_suffix, start_time, end_time, file_publish, file_pwd, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, file_kind, es_id, is_del, exp_date, dataId, flag, bak5, bak6, bak7, bak8, part_img_path, bak9, bak10 from sys_file where 1=1
and id like '%${id}%'
and create_date_time like '%${createDateTime}%'
and deleted like '%${deleted}%'
and update_date_time like '%${updateDateTime}%'
and version like '%${version}%'
and create_user_id like '%${createUserId}%'
and file_name like '%${fileName}%'
and file_path like '%${filePath}%'
and file_size like '%${fileSize}%'
and form_id like '%${formId}%'
and saved_name like '%${savedName}%'
and file_md like '%${fileMd}%'
and file_suffix like '%${fileSuffix}%'
and start_time like '%${startTime}%'
and end_time like '%${endTime}%'
and file_publish like '%${filePublish}%'
and file_pwd like '%${filePwd}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and file_kind like '%${fileKind}%'
and es_id like '%${esId}%'
and is_del like '%${isDel}%'
and exp_date like '%${expDate}%'
and dataId like '%${dataid}%'
and flag like '%${flag}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
and bak7 like '%${bak7}%'
and bak8 like '%${bak8}%'
and part_img_path like '%${partImgPath}%'
and bak9 like '%${bak9}%'
and bak10 like '%${bak10}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
select max(es_id) as scount from sys_file;
mapper.update: update sys_file set flag='1' where dataId in ('${formid}');
mapper.select:
select * from ( select sys_file.id,sys_file.file_name,sys_file.create_date_time,sys_file.file_size,sys_file.bak1, sys_file.version,sys_file.create_user_id as bak3,sys_file.file_suffix, sys_user.user_disp as create_user_id, sys_file_kind.kind_name as file_kind, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tableA.area) as userIds, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tableB.user_id) as authUserIds, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tableC.bak1) as bak4 from sys_user,sys_file_kind,sys_file left join sys_file_share tableA on (sys_file.id = tableA.file_id and tableA.status = '1') left join sys_file_kind_auth tableB on (sys_file.file_kind = tableB.file_kind_id) left join sys_file_collect tableC on (sys_file.id = tableC.file_id and tableC.create_person_id = '${userId}') where sys_file.is_del = '0' and sys_user.user_id = sys_file.file_publish and sys_file_kind.id = sys_file.file_kind
and sys_file.file_kind = #{fileKind}
and sys_file.file_name like '%${fileName}%'
group by sys_file.id ) temTable where (bak1 = 'public' or (bak1 = 'private' and userIds like '%${userId}%') or (bak1 = 'private' and bak3 like '%${userId}%') or authUserIds like '%${userId}%')
and temTable.bak4 is not null
order by create_date_time desc

select sys_file_collect.file_id as id, sys_file_collect.bak2 as file_name, sys_file_kind.kind_name as file_kind, sys_file_kind.create_date as create_date_time, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sys_file.id) as bak4 from sys_file_kind,sys_file_collect left join sys_file on (sys_file_collect.file_id = sys_file.id) where sys_file_kind.id = sys_file_collect.file_kind and sys_file_collect.create_person_id = '${userId}' and sys_file_kind.other = 'self'
and sys_file_collect.file_kind = #{fileKind}
and sys_file_collect.bak2 like '%${fileName}%'
group by sys_file_collect.file_id
insert into sys_file_version select * from sys_file where id = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from sys_file_version where 1 = 1
and sys_file_version.id = #{fileId}
